entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1700 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 10. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Friday 7 April 2023
